about.positionDesc1: Located just 2 km from the town center, enjoy the tranquility of the countryside with the convenience of nearby services, easily accessible thanks to the municipal shuttle service and local buses.
about.positionDesc2: Access to VINCANTO is via a staircase of about 200 steps, a charming path winding through the greenery. We consider these steps part of the authentic charm of the place, a small 'formichelle path' historically used to transport precious lemons. Climbing up will reward you with an unbeatable view and the feeling of reaching a hidden paradise, far from the daily hustle. It's an invitation to slow down, connect with nature, and enjoy the peace that only places like this can offer.
about.position.mai2: 8 min from Maiori port (6 min from the seafront)

hero-subtitle: A corner of paradise among the lemons of the Amalfi Coast
home.position.text1: An exclusive accommodation born from a complete renovation and immersed in the tranquility of a fragrant lemon grove. Here, luxury, comfort, and nature meet to offer you a rejuvenating stay.
Perfetta per famiglie, gruppi di amici,: Perfect for families, groups of friends, couples, and anyone wishing for a rejuvenating break in the tranquility of the Amalfi Coast, without sacrificing comfort.
home.position.DescP: The owner is always present to ensure a warm welcome and constant support during your stay
‚Ä¢ 3 camere da letto climatizzate, lumi: ‚Ä¢ 3 air-conditioned, bright, and tastefully furnished bedrooms
‚Ä¢ 3 bagni moderni di cui 2 con spazios: ‚Ä¢ 3 modern bathrooms, 2 with spacious shower trays
‚Ä¢ Smart TV in ogni camera per un intra: ‚Ä¢ Smart TV in each room for complete entertainment
‚Ä¢ Zona giorno con ampio open space con: ‚Ä¢ Living area with large open space, sofa bed, and fully equipped kitchen
‚Ä¢ Internet gratuito in tutta la casa c: ‚Ä¢ Free internet throughout the house with fast Wi-Fi connection and Ethernet LAN inputs
‚Ä¢ Aria condizionata in ogni zona della: ‚Ä¢ Air conditioning in every area of the property
‚Ä¢ Cucina esterna coperta per pranzi e: ‚Ä¢ Covered outdoor kitchen for lunches and dinners al fresco.
‚Ä¢ Doccia esterna, perfetta per rinfres: ‚Ä¢ Outdoor shower, perfect for cooling off after a day at the sea or hiking
La struttura si trova in una zona collin: The property is located in a quiet hilly area, surrounded by greenery. Accessible via about 200 steps, historically used by the 'formichelle' (little ants), the women who transported lemons. An authentic experience and an unforgettable view, ideal for lovers of tranquility.
Il Tuo angolo di Paradiso nel Limoneto: Your corner of Paradise in the Lemon Grove

section.booking.rules.minoriList1: For children aged 0 to 3 years, the stay is free.
section.booking.rules.summerList1: From August 11th to 24th, only weekly bookings from Sunday to Sunday are accepted.
section.booking.rules.allYearList1: The minimum stay throughout the year is 2 nights.
section.booking.rules.checkinoutList1: Check-in: from 16:00 (early check-in possible at owner's discretion)
section.booking.rules.paymentList1: To confirm the booking, a deposit of 30% is required. The remaining balance must be paid at check-in. More details will be provided at the time of booking via email.

about.longdesc1: Every detail of VINCANTO is designed to offer you an unforgettable stay. The interiors, completely renovated, combine contemporary design and quality materials: elegant porcelain stoneware floors and coverings, handmade Vietri ceramic wall lights, refined furnishings and high-quality finishes. The new PVC windows ensure silence and comfort, while the mosquito nets on doors and windows let you enjoy the country breeze in total relaxation.
about.longdesc2: The property has two double bedrooms with King Size beds, one room with two single beds, all bright and welcoming, and three modern and functional bathrooms with large shower trays for maximum comfort and privacy. The open space kitchen, fully equipped, is perfect for sharing convivial moments and preparing your favorite dishes.
about.longdesc3: Immersed in the fragrant heart of a typical lemon grove of the Amalfi Coast.
about.longdesc4: Outside, guests can enjoy an outdoor kitchen, perfect for lunches and dinners under the pergola, overlooking the surrounding greenery. Completing the offer are an outdoor shower, a traditional wood-fired oven and a barbecue, ideal for convivial evenings surrounded by the scent of lemons and the sea.

seo.home.title: VINCANTO | Maiori - Amalfi Coast
seo.home.description: Vincanto is a property nestled in the lemon groves of the Amalfi Coast in Maiori. Book your exclusive stay, comfort and premium services. Ideal for families and groups. Contact us for personalized offers.
seo.about.title: VINCANTO | About Us
seo.about.description: Discover the history of Vincanto, our mission, and the values that guide us. A place where luxury, comfort, and nature meet to offer you a rejuvenating stay.
seo.propriety.title: VINCANTO | The Property
seo.propriety.description: Explore our property, rooms, services, and rates. Discover why Vincanto is the ideal choice for your stay on the Amalfi Coast.
seo.contact.title: VINCANTO | Contacts and Inquiries
seo.contact.description: Contact us for reservations, questions, or special requests. We are here to help you plan your perfect stay at Vincanto.
